Today in Moray, it's looking solid with 3 ft @ 8s E swell and a moderate 11 mph S wind. Fraserburgh and West Point are your go-to spots, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 1 ft @ 7s ENE, making it a flat day with no real surf action. On the day after, conditions improve again with 3 ft @ 8s E swell and light 9 mph S winds, making spots like Fraserburgh and Pennan fun options. Best: today.
